mapper.sql: byday, marketplaceid, SKU, amazonAuthid, parent_asin, child_asin, Sessions, Session_Percentage, Page_Views, Page_Views_Percentage, Buy_Box_Percentage, Units_Ordered, Units_Ordered_B2B, Unit_Session_Percentage, Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, Ordered_Product_Sales, Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, Total_Order_Items, Total_Order_Items_B2B
mapper.insert:
delete from t_amz_product_pageviews where byday = #{byday,jdbcType=DATE} and marketplaceid = #{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} and amazonAuthid = #{amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR};
insert ignore into t_amz_product_pageviews(byday, marketplaceid, SKU, amazonAuthid, parent_asin, child_asin, Sessions, Session_Percentage, Page_Views, Page_Views_Percentage, Buy_Box_Percentage, Units_Ordered, Units_Ordered_B2B, Unit_Session_Percentage, Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, Ordered_Product_Sales, Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, Total_Order_Items, Total_Order_Items_B2B) select byday, marketplaceid, SKU, amazonAuthid, parent_asin, child_asin, Sessions, Session_Percentage, Page_Views, Page_Views_Percentage, Buy_Box_Percentage, Units_Ordered, Units_Ordered_B2B, Unit_Session_Percentage, Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, Ordered_Product_Sales, Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, Total_Order_Items, Total_Order_Items_B2B from t_amz_product_pageviews_download where byday = #{byday,jdbcType=DATE} and marketplaceid = #{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} and amazonAuthid = #{amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR};

insert ignore into t_amz_product_pageviews_download (id,byday, marketplaceid, SKU, amazonAuthid, parent_asin, child_asin, Sessions, Session_Percentage, Page_Views, Page_Views_Percentage, Buy_Box_Percentage, Units_Ordered, Units_Ordered_B2B, Unit_Session_Percentage, Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, Ordered_Product_Sales, Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, Total_Order_Items, Total_Order_Items_B2B,opttime) values
(#{rpt.id,jdbcType=CHAR},#{rpt.byday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rpt.marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rpt.sku,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rpt.amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rpt.parentAsin,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rpt.childAsin,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rpt.sessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rpt.sessionPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.pageViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rpt.pageViewsPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.buyBoxPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.unitsOrdered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rpt.unitsOrderedB2b,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rpt.unitSessionPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.unitSessionPercentageB2b,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.orderedProductSales,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.orderedProductSalesB2b,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rpt.totalOrderItems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rpt.totalOrderItemsB2b,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rpt.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT amazonAuthid,marketplaceid,byday,MAX(opttime) opttime from t_amz_product_pageviews_download GROUP BY amazonAuthid,marketplaceid,byday

delete from t_amz_product_pageviews_week where byday >=DATE_SUB(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR} ,INTERVAL WEEKDAY(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR}) + 0 DAY) and amazonAuthid=#{amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR} and marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR};
INSERT ignore INTO t_amz_product_pageviews_week (byday, marketplaceid, SKU, amazonAuthid, parent_asin, child_asin, Sessions, Session_Percentage, Page_Views, Page_Views_Percentage, Buy_Box_Percentage, Units_Ordered, Units_Ordered_B2B, Unit_Session_Percentage, Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, Ordered_Product_Sales, Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, Total_Order_Items, Total_Order_Items_B2B) SELECT DATE_SUB(byday ,INTERVAL WEEKDAY(byday) + 0 DAY) byday, marketplaceid marketplaceid,SKU,amazonAuthid, parent_asin,child_asin, SUM(Sessions) Sessions, SUM(Session_Percentage)/count(0) Session_Percentage, SUM(Page_Views) Page_Views, SUM(Page_Views_Percentage)/count(0) Page_Views_Percentage, SUM(Buy_Box_Percentage)/count(0) Buy_Box_Percentage, SUM(Units_Ordered) Units_Ordered, sum(Units_Ordered_B2B) Units_Ordered_B2B, sum(Unit_Session_Percentage)/count(0) Unit_Session_Percentage, sum(Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B)/count(0) Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, sum(Ordered_Product_Sales) Ordered_Product_Sales, sum(Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B) Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, sum(Total_Order_Items) Total_Order_Items, sum(Total_Order_Items_B2B) Total_Order_Items_B2B FROM t_amz_product_pageviews WHERE byday >= DATE_SUB(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR} ,INTERVAL WEEKDAY(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR}) + 0 DAY) and amazonAuthid= #{amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR} and marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY amazonAuthid,marketplaceid,DATE_SUB(byday ,INTERVAL WEEKDAY(byday) + 0 DAY),sku ;

delete from t_amz_product_pageviews_month where byday >=DATE_ADD(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR},interval -day(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR})+1 day) and amazonAuthid=#{amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR} and marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} ;
INSERT ignore INTO t_amz_product_pageviews_month (byday, marketplaceid, SKU, amazonAuthid, parent_asin, child_asin, Sessions, Session_Percentage, Page_Views, Page_Views_Percentage, Buy_Box_Percentage, Units_Ordered, Units_Ordered_B2B, Unit_Session_Percentage, Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, Ordered_Product_Sales, Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, Total_Order_Items, Total_Order_Items_B2B) SELECT DATE_ADD(byday,interval -day(byday)+1 day) byday, marketplaceid marketplaceid,SKU,amazonAuthid, parent_asin,child_asin, SUM(Sessions) Sessions, SUM(Session_Percentage)/count(0) Session_Percentage, SUM(Page_Views) Page_Views, SUM(Page_Views_Percentage)/count(0) Page_Views_Percentage, SUM(Buy_Box_Percentage)/count(0) Buy_Box_Percentage, SUM(Units_Ordered) Units_Ordered, sum(Units_Ordered_B2B) Units_Ordered_B2B, sum(Unit_Session_Percentage)/count(0) Unit_Session_Percentage, sum(Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B)/count(0) Unit_Session_Percentage_B2B, sum(Ordered_Product_Sales) Ordered_Product_Sales, sum(Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B) Ordered_Product_Sales_B2B, sum(Total_Order_Items) Total_Order_Items, sum(Total_Order_Items_B2B) Total_Order_Items_B2B FROM t_amz_product_pageviews WHERE byday >=DATE_ADD(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR},interval -day(#{begin,jdbcType=CHAR})+1 day) and amazonAuthid= #{amazonAuthid,jdbcType=CHAR} and marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY amazonAuthid,marketplaceid,DATE_ADD(byday,interval -day(byday)+1 day),sku ;
